channel.title: Add Universal Logout to your app :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Add Universal Logout to your app Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Existing doc: changes are needed to update the doc and to fit the new IA Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Description: This as-new doc needs to guide a user through an implementation of UL, including code and explanation of flow. The HTTP Response codes should not be included, and those looking for an overview of UL should be directed to Learn > SLO and UL
